<font face="_sans" size="14">1. <TEXTFORMAT BLOCKINDENT='20'>Paula, Tyler, and Bobby are developing a new e-learning course. They all live in different cities and are very self-directed.</textformat></font>

<font face="_sans" size="14">4. <TEXTFORMAT BLOCKINDENT='20'>Tabitha has a company that developes interactive websites for real estate agents. She meets with her clients over the phone and uses collaboration software to show them her work.</textformat></font>
